descriptionHtml:
STORYLINE:
Brunos is a Tamriel pirate. One day his group got ambushed by Bounty Hunters. Brunos was hiding inside a small secret panic room full of spikes. He spent 4 days there eating other heroes\' food he stole. When he got out, he ran to Winterhold and he\'s hoping to join a good army to can gut the Bounty Hunters that killed his friends.

DESCRIPTION:
You start with almost NOTHING in your inventory. You are a Redguard.You decide what to do - from this time it\'s completly your game. Just roleplay it. The main quest is disabled. You have no markers on your map. You dont know nothing about the Helgen dragon incident.

INSTALLATION: 
Drop the esp file in:
Documents\\ My Games\\ Skyrim\\ saves

INFORMATION:

Main quest is disabled (open the console and type \"setstage MQ102 30\" if you want to enable it)
You don\'t have any map markers - you have to discover everything by yourself
Brunos is level 1 and his skills are the same.
author: Seeth123456
